website_summaries.verdict: Multi-sport athletes will love the Spark 3's ability to track everything from runs to swims to gym workouts. And it boasts a built-in 500 song music player.
pros: Multisport Mode to track all indoor and outdoor sports
Tracks time, distance, speed, pace, calories burned, and sleep
Includes Bluetooth music player and sweatproof wireless headphones with earhooks
cons: The band is not durable and breaks relatively easily

customer_reviews.title: bulky hard to navigate
customer_reviews.text: The idea of being able to download my music was a bonus, since they are not longer making ipods and I don't like to carry a bulky phone with me on my runs was the reason that I originally purchased this item. That idea was gone when I received the watch. It is really big and bulky and I ordered the small one. It wasn't comfortable to wear at all. I tried to look past this because again, the music was a good idea. I found that I could not. The buttons where hard to push, not easy to navigate while working out and back light was a continued issue. Had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Hansen

customer_reviews.title: The watch is great I had mine for 3 months the band broke ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch is great I had mine for 3 months the band broke without any signs of wear and tear and fell off my arm cracked the screen I called clever training they said to call tom tom. Tom tom said the screens only good for 30 days but they will send me a replacement watch band anit going to do any good if water gets in the damn watch and messes it up happy with watch performance but tom tom warranty suxs they didn't even offer a exchange after the money I paid for this watch and only 3 months of use. Be careful
customer_reviews.author: lonnie

customer_reviews.title: The software is horrible. Customer support is non-existent
customer_reviews.text: The software is horrible. Customer support is non-existent. I can not get the device to recognize correctly and their website refuses to allow me even email technical support. Definitely will not be buying another TomTom device ever.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Wierenga

customer_reviews.title: Well this item was suposed to be a great help for my trainings but I haven't been abble ...
customer_reviews.text: Well this item was suposed to be a great help for my trainings but I haven't been abble to even used it once, because I found it hard to understand the instructions, there are all graphics, there was not user's mannual, I had to look for it on line and download it, but t's not clear enough, at least for me, at this moment I'm not abble to get it started for a run or to even just listen to the music. More than $200 wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Does not sync!
customer_reviews.text: This watch does not sync every time, even if it’s plugged in to a computer. I waited a couple weeks and ran quite a few times in between, and it only uploaded a couple of my runs. Not sure what happened to the other data. I’ve been running with this for several months and still have the same problems- It takes forever to sync if it decides to sync at all, and some runs are missing. I tried all the suggestions by tomtom and it didn’t make a difference. I’m disappointed in tomtom.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Maybe mines has a glitch.
customer_reviews.text: I missed the window to return this but, if I hadn't, I would have sent it back for a refund. In short, the watch was easy to program and track steps but every time I went to use it to track running and swimming it would randomly stop tracking the workout and go back to the main screen. I tried numerous times to work with it but it kept happening. Now, it's just sitting on my desk unused which is a bummer because I heard so many great things about it.
customer_reviews.author: LaShawndra Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Great watch defective band
customer_reviews.text: Love the functions of this watch but the bands are defective. As you read other reviews you see that the same issue holds true with hundreds of others. I had two bands break in one year under what I would call normal use during road runs. When you spend $250 on a watch, you don’t want to have to spend another $60 on replacement bands and who knows how many more will be required. What is worse is when contacting TomTom they won’t do anything to help. Not good. I won’t be using any of their products in the future for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: TARA PENDERGRAFT

customer_reviews.title: Watch works great, but the headphones were dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Watch works great, but the headphones were dead on arrival. Trying to warranty through Tom Tom turned out to be overly difficult. I opened the headphone side that contained the battery and found that the battery had leaked inside the case and was no good. I was able to pair a different set of bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad band
customer_reviews.text: The watch is good, but big. The band, however, has already cracked and broken all the way in just 3 months. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Darin K

customer_reviews.title: Very Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this watch to work . . . but it was very inconsistent regarding battery life, running pace, and earbud connectivity. Eventually, all functions stopped working. TomTom has been great with offering a replacement. However, if you want to save time and aggravation, I would recommend just spending a bit more for the apple i watch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Bassett

customer_reviews.title: headphones
customer_reviews.text: My watch isn't a year old yet and my headphones stopped working a side. I am pretty disappointed about because before that I was in love with it!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Reis

customer_reviews.title: Great fitness watch
customer_reviews.text: Great fitness watch. The functions and online interaction is excellent. The negative- the band won’t last long. Be prepared to buy a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Zansabar Coltrain

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I was looking for a watch that can measure without the need of a chest belt. This one also has the ability to store music and got a GPS. After few tries I. Will definitely recommend it!! It's really give you everything in a cheap package. The only disadvantage is the speed of the GPS lock..
customer_reviews.author: Natan Katz

customer_reviews.title: TomTom Spark 3
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my teen daughter and she likes it so far. She's had it for about 3 weeks and tells me she's having a hard time getting the GPS part working and the bluetooth ear buds won't sync. I'll have to look at it....

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch.
customer_reviews.text: The watch does everything its supposed to do. The only problem I found was that when I run with it in my left wrist, sometimes the bluetooth earphone loose conection, but just change wrists and its fine. Nice price for what it gives. Ah! And I missed a open water mode for it, it only have for indoor swim.
customer_reviews.author: Diogo N Chuairi

customer_reviews.title: Good watch, but strap will break
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I wear it everyday: to run, to swim, at the gym, to sleep. 10 months into wearing it, the strap started tearing until it finally broke (see picture). Buy the watch, but be ready to buy a replacement strap because the original TomTom strap will break.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Almeyda-Cohen

customer_reviews.title: This product it's not durable at all
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this fitness watch for running purpose and in less than one year the bluetooth earphone is not working anymore, it's not charging (9 months of moderated use).

customer_reviews.title: The rest of it works great, but for $200 you would think the band ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this in September. 6 months later and the band has completely broken. The rest of it works great, but for $200 you would think the band would last longer than 6 months. Very disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: I was really sad because I was super excited to have music & ...
customer_reviews.text: Too complicated for my simple mind... back to my fit bit! I was really sad because I was super excited to have music & tracking all on one device. I am sure for most it would be a great buy.

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy.

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tomtom Spark
customer_reviews.text: Received in proper condition and within the time period! Working perfect for me. Music quality is nice when you hear with the headphone! I like the product. And the GPS works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Abhijit D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sport watch
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sport watch. I love it. Now I can finally do my regular running without bringing my hand phone along. The GPS map is also very accurate.

customer_reviews.text: It can't keep working during full-marathon. Too poor battery. However, my friend's one is fine in working during full-marathon.

customer_reviews.text: Great device. The music you can store on it, make this tracker the best.

customer_reviews.title: Wont buy Tomtom again
customer_reviews.text: Wont buy from Tomtom again. The main reason that i bought was to have music and datas together, but the Bluetooth is terrible, we have to use the watch on the right arm, if not there is no range. There is no auto pause if you forget to pause, during a small stop(trafic lights) all the information are incorrect. Terrible customer care, they do not answer my emails.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the folks that don't use smart watches ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the folks that don't use smart watches that sync to smart phones and have to rely on a secondary device for music, this is all in the one. The headphones are good but you'll probably want to replace. This was a gift to my girlfriend and she likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Music sometimes doesn't sync and the watch will not work with map-my-run
customer_reviews.author: Kris M.

customer_reviews.title: I love being able to go for a run with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I debated between the vivoactive HR and this watch. Ultimately I kept this one, mostly for the ability to play music. I love being able to go for a run with the GPS, HR monitor, and music on the watch without the need for other devices. I have found the GPS quick and accurate. I had no problems setting up the watch and it was very easy to upload music from my computer. This one does not transmit iphone notifications, but I do not find that to be an issue. The bluetooth headphones work perfectly and actually stay in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Collins

customer_reviews.title: This is not good.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this running watch as NEW and paid new price but received a used one. The package was open and the watch had someone's running information already stored in the watch. This is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love my TomTom spark. I researched a lot of running watches before purchasing this one. I think it's much more accurate than my Fitbit. I love that you can swim and it also tracks cycling well. Battery lasts normal amount for a GPS watch. love to run with Bluetooth headphones and the watch - no carrying a phone! I just wish it had smart notifications! It's a little bulky but I think it looks much better than most other fitness watches.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Horst

customer_reviews.title: Great tracker
customer_reviews.text: Functionality is great, from biking to running it keeps track accurately. I've even used it a couple times to get back when I've gotten lost on an unmarked trail. Only thing I don't like is how bulky it is, it just isn't aesthetically pleasing, especially if you have a smaller wrist it looks huge.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Getting close to perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's not perfect but it's close. Easy to read, love that I can listen to music from the watch. I wish the audio prompts were more extensive. GPS works perfectly and locks in very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia G.

customer_reviews.title: Great features, broke way too quickly
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Found GPS quickly and accurately tracked my runs. Easily and quickly tracking my heart rate over the day Decent battery life with three days without a charge Cons: UI is tough to navigate Dropped connection to wireless headphones often Worst of all, watch BROKE in six months after nothing but running. Very disappointed. Will not buy another TomTom product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bimm

customer_reviews.title: It is a great all around watch for everyday
customer_reviews.text: It is a great all around watch for everyday, running, swimming and other activities. There is only two drawbacks, the music cuts out in the headphones for a slight second and the second, playing your music seems to drain the battery pretty quickly. Other than that, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Wessenberg

customer_reviews.title: But satallite connexts quickly and basics are fine for walking and running
customer_reviews.text: Challenging to set up screens, doesn't have the same ease of use as Garvin products. But satallite connexts quickly and basics are fine for walking and running.

customer_reviews.title: I don't love the toggle button at all
customer_reviews.text: I don't love the toggle button at all. I do like the large numbers when showing heart rate. Mine doesn't always sync well to my phone. I often have to reboot. The music in the watch is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: I already have one and really like it! Occasionally it doesn't get the connection as ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Father's day, I already have one and really like it! Occasionally it doesn't get the connection as quick as you would like when you are running - not sure why. But it is easy to use and I believe he really likes it! Haven't water tested it, but it is a great fitness tracking watch.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G

customer_reviews.title: It is a great watch, the reason I do not give it ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great watch, the reason I do not give it a 5 stars is because you cannot pause or disconnect the music directly from the watch.

product_meta.title: TOCG9 1RKM.002.11 Tomtom Spark 3 Cardio + Music, GPS Fitness Watch + Heart Rate Monitor + 3GB Music + Bluetooth Headphones (Black, Small)
product_meta.description: A GPS fitness Watch with storage for up to 500 songs gives you all the musical motivation you need while working out. Listen wirelessly to your inspirational playlists with the included Bluetooth headphones. See real-time metrics like pace, distance, and speed with a glance to your wrist. Push yourself with advanced training modes such as Interval Training, Training Zones, Race Mode, Recovery Indicator and more. You can safely explore new trails with route exploration that will help you get back to the start. 24/7 activity tracking and multisport functionality means you can capture every active minute of your day. Sprints, strolls, bikes, stairs, steps, swims. Every minute counts. See distance, calories burned, and steps throughout the day. Battery life is up to 3 weeks in non-gps mode and up to 5 hours with GPS and music on. List of compatible phones: Apple: all iPhones with iOS 8 and above. Android 4.4 and above with following phones: Samsung: S7, S7 Edge, S6, S6 Edge, S5, S5 Mini, S5 Plus, S4, S4 Mini, A3, A5, Note 3, Note 4, J5, Nexus: 5, 5X, 6, HTC: One M8 and M9, LG: G4, Sony: Xperia Z3, Z3 Compact, Z5, Z5 Compact, Huawei: P8, P8 Lite, OnePlus One. Display size:0.87 x 0.98 inches. Strap size: 125-172 mm
feature_bullets: GPS Sport Watch and Bluetooth Music Player: Included Bluetooth headphones have contoured ear hooks, are sweat and weatherproof, last for up to 4 hours, and pair with your Spark and phone simultaneously
Multisport Mode: Track all your activities including runs, bikes, swims, treadmill runs, gym workouts, indoor cycling, and more. Waterproof up to 40m
Running Watch and Activity Tracker: Measures time, distance, speed, pace, calories burned, heart rate and live stats on the go

GPS Watch with Advanced Features: Spark 3 is a 24/7 fitness tracker with heart rate that keeps you motivated. Activate audio feedback on your performance as you workout to see how you're doing. Set up custom walk-run interval sessions or a goal for your workout session

Heart Rate Monitor: No chest strap needed with a built-in heart rate monitor, which allows you to easily see your heart rate at all times throughout the day or while working out. size small: 125-172mm & size large: 145-206mm
